caption.center: R.L.K., a child, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Manatee County; Scott M. Brownell, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Frederick W. Vollrath, Tampa, for Appellant.
Robert A. Butterworth, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Deborah F. Hogge, Assistant Attorney General, Tampa, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
ALTENBERND, A.C.J., and NORTHCUTT and CASANUEVA, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED
